segments.text: Is this the right counter to check in for this flight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is . Please put your luggage on the scale .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your luggage is overweight . The free allowance for luggage is 20 kilos .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , can I keep this little suitcase as hand-luggage ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , in this way it's just below the limit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here's your ticket and your boarding card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I will begin boarding soon .
segments.speaker: S1
